price: 85.(Alle) wuxuu yidhi: Waxaanu imtixaannay qolodaadii gadaashaa, waxaana lumiyey As-Saamiri.’
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
